Project information

  • Category: Cross platform PWA web app
  • Deliverables: Web development, Web design
  • Project URL: www.readyoutubevideos.com

Read Videos PWA web app helps you maximize learning from educational videos on YouTube

It's an interactive transcript player and reader for YouTube videos. Can be installed on iOS, Android, Windows, Mac and Linux operating systems.
